description: Retrospective alterations to shopfront including a replacement entrance door, louvre above left sided entrance door, addition of glazing bars to ground floor windows and installation of wall lights at ground floor level on the front elevation.
decision_conditions: REASON: The alterations to the front elevation including the addition of the stuck on glazing bars and louvre by virtue of their inappropriate design would detract from and be harmful to the appearance of the building and the character and appearance of the Bunhill Fields/Finsbury Square Conservation Area contrary to policies CS7 and CS9 of the Islington Core Strategy 2011, policies D4, D11, D13 and D24 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002 and guidance contained within the Conservation Area Design Guidelines 2002 and Islington Shopfront Design Guide 2003.
